awd_titl_txt: Export Agriculture and Development:  Towards a Comparative  Study
awd_abstract_narration: Project Objectives:  The primary objective of the project is                    to develop a competitive research proposal on "Export                           Agriculture and Development:  Towards a Comparative Study."                     A first specific objective is to extinct and refine from the                    literature a set of testable hypotheses concerning the                          conditions under which export sector expansion leads to some                    form of development.  Broader Significance of the Project:                      Support of the project will assist a well trained black,                        sociologist to improve his regular MRI proposal.  The                           planning activities, if successful, will significantly                          enhance the potential of the investigator to compete for MRI                    and other research support.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: Division of Social and Economic Sciences

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: RESEARCH FOUNDATION OF THE CITY UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK
